name: Command & Conquer: Generals - Zero Hour
description:
Command & Conquer: Generals - Zero Hour is a strategy game developed by Electronic Arts Los Angeles. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Electronic Arts. Command & Conquer: Generals - Zero Hour has a Metascore of 83, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Command & Conquer: Generals - Zero Hour on macOS and PC.
